title: Instructions for the Tabernacle
summary: Exodus 25 begins the detailed instructions for building the tabernacle. God tells Moses how to construct the Ark of the Covenant, the table for bread, and the golden lampstand—each symbolizing God’s presence and provision.

faq.question: What was the purpose of the tabernacle?
faq.answer: It was a sacred place where God would dwell among His people.

faq.question: What items were described in this chapter?
faq.answer: The Ark of the Covenant, the table of showbread, and the golden lampstand.
